name: Verify NFSP value by passing NFSP in URL
id: stories/fp/nfsp/NFSPValidation.story;Verify NFSP value by passing NFSP in URL

testSteps.description: Given Register a fully registered user through RF and login to the site

children.description: Register fully reg from RF and login to site

testSteps.description: When Do a search and Verify SERP page
Then Verify NFSP source and segment as per admin config 'nfspAccessIds','portv2'

children.description: Get nfsp source from page source

Get nfsp segment from json: {"portv2":["pch.portalv2","pch.portalv2","pch.portalv2"],"fpnew":["pch.fp001","pch.fp001","pch.fp001"],"fpcontrol":["pch.fpcontrol","pch.fpcontrol","pch.fpcontrol"],"fptest":["fpch.fptest","fpch.fptest","fpch.fptest"],"swguidedmpath":["pch.searchmobilepath","pch.searchmobilepath","pch.searchmobilepath"],"mx_d":"pch.fpcontrol","mx_t":"pch.fpcontrol","mx_m":"pch.fpcontrol"}, portv2
Get nfsp segment from page source

testSteps.description: And User redirect to the current URL 'nfsp=fpcontrol'
And Verify NFSP source and segment as per admin config 'nfspAccessIds','fpcontrol'

children.description: Get nfsp source from page source

Get nfsp segment from json: {"portv2":["pch.portalv2","pch.portalv2","pch.portalv2"],"fpnew":["pch.fp001","pch.fp001","pch.fp001"],"fpcontrol":["pch.fpcontrol","pch.fpcontrol","pch.fpcontrol"],"fptest":["fpch.fptest","fpch.fptest","fpch.fptest"],"swguidedmpath":["pch.searchmobilepath","pch.searchmobilepath","pch.searchmobilepath"],"mx_d":"pch.fpcontrol","mx_t":"pch.fpcontrol","mx_m":"pch.fpcontrol"}, fpcontrol
Get nfsp segment from page source

userStory.narrative:
In order to verify NFSP in browser console
As a Tester
I want to configure the expected NFSP (Source and Segments) in Joomla admin
